sentence.text: Of note, all those genes are causative for progressive hearing loss in humans, but not in epidermis development.
The deafness genes GJB3, negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II, GRHL2, DFNA5, and ATP6B1 were expressed in marmoset cochleae in patterns different from those in mouse cochleae.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: The other tested genes, including the deafness gene regulation of cell shape, in which mutation recapitulates deafness in epidermis development, were expressed in a similar manner in both species.
